PROGRAM RELATED INVESTMENTS (PRIS) ARE AN INTEGRAL PART OF THE FOUNDATION'S EXEMPT PROGRAMS AND ARE UNDERTAKEN TO COMPLEMENT AND EXTEND ITS GRANTMAKING ACTIVITIES. PRIS ARE MADE TO FURTHER THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENT'S MISSION AND VISION. PRIS ARE GENERALLY MADE AS LOANS ALTHOUGH OTHER INVESTMENT TYPES MAY BE USED AS ALLOWED UNDER IRC SECTION 4944. EACH PRI MEETS THE FOLLOWING THREE REQUIREMENTS: A) THE THE PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ACCOMPLISH ONE OR MORE OF THE FOUNDATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSES; B) PRODUCTION OF INCOME OR APPRECIATION OF PROPERTY IS NOT A SIGNIFICANT PURPOSE; AND C) PRI FUNDS ARE NOT USED TO INFLUENCE LEGISLATION OR TAKE PART IN POLITICAL CAMPAIGNS ON BEHALF OF CANDIDATES. SEE PART VIII-B AND STATEMENTS 21 AND 23 FOR A DESCRIPTION OF THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF EACH PRI MADE IN 2021.
GUARANTEE FEE INCOME IS RELATED TO PROGRAM-RELATED INVESTMENTS.

GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: (1) CENTER FOR HEALTHY COMMUNITIES AT THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENTTHE CENTER FOR HEALTHY COMMUNITIES (THE CENTER) IS COMPRISED OF VENUES IN LOS ANGELES, OAKLAND, AND SACRAMENTO, PROVIDING MEETING SPACES TO MOBILIZE COMMUNITY AND CIVIC LEADERS, HEALTH PROVIDERS, ADVOCATES AND POLICYMAKERS IN THE SEARCH FOR SOLUTIONS TO CALIFORNIA'S CRITICAL HEALTH AND HEALTHCARE ISSUES.THE CENTER OFFERS A VARIETY OF PROGRAMS AND SERVICES THROUGHOUT CALIFORNIA, INCLUDING CONFERENCE CENTERS, AND RESEARCH AND TRAINING FACILITIES. BY COMBINING ALL THESE RESOURCES IN ONE ACCESSIBLE LOCATION, THE CENTER AIMS TO BECOME THE PREMIER VENUE FOR ACTIVITIES ADDRESSING CALIFORNIA'S HEALTH CALLENGES, AND A LAUNCH PAD FOR COLLABORATIVE ACTION.THE CENTER PROVIDES: - MEETING SPACES AVAILABLE FREE OF CHARGE, FOR QUALIFIED NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS WHOSE PROGRAMS ADVANCE THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENT'S MISSION TO EXPAND ACCESS TO AFFORDABLE, QUALITY HEALTH CARE FOR UNDERSERVED INDIVIDUALS AND COMMUNITIES, AND TO PROMOTE FUNDAMENTAL IMPROVEMENTS IN THE HEALTH STATUS OF ALL CALIFORNIANS.- PUBLIC EVENT MANAGEMENT SERVICES INCLUDING EVEN SUPPORT, EVENT PUBLICITY AND AUDIENCE MANAGEMENT - ONLINE LEARNING COMMUNITYDURING THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, THE CENTER RETAINED ALL ITS STAFF AND FACILITY CAPACITIES.

(2) MEDIA CAMPAIGNS BY THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENT - M. ENTERTAINMENTM. ENTERTAINMENT PROVIDED THE MEDIA-BUY SERVICES TO THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENT (TCE) INCLUDING THE FOLLOWING CAMPAIGNS:"MOTHER'S DAY COVID VACCINE AWARENESS" - BOOSTING MOTHER'S DAY COVID VACCINE AWARENESS VIDEOS IN THE BAY AREA, INLAND EMPIRE, LOS ANGELES & CENTRAL VALLEY."MOTHER'S DAY COVID VACCINE AWARENESS" - BOOSTING MOTHER'S DAY COVID VACCINE AWARENESS VIDEOS IN THE BAY AREA, INLAND EMPIRE, LOS ANGELES & CENTRAL VALLEY."FUTURO MEDIA MARIA HINOJOSA EVENT" - FUTURO MEDIA MARIA HINOJOSA EVENT PROMOTION SOCIAL MEDIA CAMPAIGN."THE HISTORY OF THE VACCINE" - ADVERTISEMENTS BRINGING AWARENESS TO THE HISTORY OF THE VACCINE IN THE OAKLAND POST. "ANGELA DAVIS EVENT" - SOCIAL MEDIA PROMOTION OF THE ANGELA DAVIS EVENT HOSTED BY CALENDOWLIVE."TCE YOUTH AWARDS EVENT" - SOCIAL MEDIA PROMOTION OF THE YOUTH AWARDS EVENT HOSTED BY THE CALIFORNIA ENDOWMENT"WOMEN AUTHORS OF COLOR EVENT" - SOCIAL MEDIA PROMOTION OF THE WOMEN AUTHORS OF COLOR EVENT HOSTED BY CALENDOWLIVE."HEALTH4ALL" - SOCIAL MEDIA PROMOTION OF TCE'S HEALTH4ALL CAMPAIGN."DR.
